channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2024010424
item.description:
Report E-2024010424

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-25T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: WEST VALLEY CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 16, 2024, one (1) 275-gallon tote of UN3266 was failing near the valve and leaked approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the impacted site. ES personnel utilized hand tools and absorbents to remediate the UN3266-impacted loading dock to the extent practicable. Crews transferred the remaining product from the damaged tote to a new one. The damaged tote and all impacted debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and one (1) 35-gallon drum for transport and disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024010383
item.description:
Report X-2024010383

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-08
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO FIVE PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE COOLING SUPER CRISPY CRINKLE CUT FRIES INSIDE EACH PACKAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED IN THE AIR NETWORK. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z5EA2141337300270, 1Z5EA2141326967901, 1Z5EA2141330598669 AND 1Z5EA2141326100382. THE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 5EA214, ZAYA, 106 E 580 ST N, VINEYARD UT 84059-6066.
